root.name: Airline Tycoon
root.description: A Tycoon game for PC centered around running an airline.GamePlayThe player plays a manager of one of four different airlines. Starting with 2 planes the player must set routes to fly, carry out charter flights and build up their airline until they have taken over the other 3 airlines. It plays much the same as a point and click adventure game where you move around the airport visiting various different companies to buy fuel for planes, upgrade planes pick up charter flights and even sabotage the other airlines.Playable CharactersThe Game features four characters which each have their own airline and color scheme.Tina Cortez, Sunshine Airways (Blue)Siggi Sorglos, Falcon Lines (Green)Igor Tuppolevsky, Phoenix Travel (Red)Mario Zucchero, Honey Airlines (Yellow)
